bfe5cee9-ab61-4770-b521-8f3f0969db62.description: Registered Medical Assistant certification is designated as RMA(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and/or experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous RMA exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of entry-level medical assistants.
bfe5cee9-ab61-4770-b521-8f3f0969db62.name: Registered Medical Assistant

badge_template_activities.title: Registered Medical Assistant Certification Routes
Registered Medical Assistant Professional Profile
Exam Content Outline
Must pass the RMA exam with a score of 70% or above.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

98f4fde5-22d0-4345-adac-f477cf615063.description: Registered Phlebotomy Technician certification is designated as RPT(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and/or experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous RPT exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of entry-level phlebotomists.
98f4fde5-22d0-4345-adac-f477cf615063.name: Registered Phlebotomy Technician

badge_template_activities.title: RPT Certification Routes
RPT Professional Profile
RPT Exam Content Outline

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.
Must pass the RPT Exam with a score of 70% or above.

749f5076-85e5-4fb0-ba90-effaaaa0ba69.description: Medical Laboratory Scientist certification is designated as MLS (AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and experience, including a baccalaureate degree or an approved equivalent degree. Certificants must pass the rigorous MLS exam, which assesses knowledge, skills, and abilities associated with critical competencies for medical laboratory scientists.
749f5076-85e5-4fb0-ba90-effaaaa0ba69.name: Medical Laboratory Scientist

alignments.name: National Accreditation Agency for Clinical Laboratory Sciences (NAACLS)

badge_template_activities.title: MLS Certification Routes
MLS Professional Profile
MLS Exam Content Outline
Must pass the MLS Exam, or other examination approved by the AMT Board of Directors, with a score of 70% or above.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

cbd33748-1844-4fc0-b346-5798a16a6bb3.description: Medical Laboratory Technician certification is designated as MLT(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous MLT exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of entry-level medical laboratory technicians.
cbd33748-1844-4fc0-b346-5798a16a6bb3.name: Medical Laboratory Technician

Must pass the MLT exam, or other examination approved by the AMT Board of Directors, with a score of 70% or above.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

cab210a6-c4e7-4cdc-b84a-c8800e99f825.description: Registered Dental Assistant certification is designated as RDA(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. 3e0328ca-66a7-4cc7-b001-d69af102dbe2.description: AMT's Allied Health Instructor certification is designated as AHI(AMT). The certificant is an educator who brings a critical combination of healthcare subject matter expertise and significant teaching experience to the classroom. AHIs have established a mastery of their subjects through structured academic courses or professional certification in the areas of pedagogy for which they are responsible. AHIs serve as mentors to future practitioners.
3e0328ca-66a7-4cc7-b001-d69af102dbe2.name: Allied Health Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: AHI Certification Routes
Hold professional certification in his or her field of instruction from a nationally recognized certification organization.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

9bbdb146-9df4-41d8-9de6-065b0f3d155f.description: Certified Medical Laboratory Assistant certification is designated as CMLA(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and/or experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous CMLA exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of medical laboratory assistants.
9bbdb146-9df4-41d8-9de6-065b0f3d155f.name: Certified Medical Laboratory Assistant

10592e28-66e8-4d3e-8643-4470bf488f1d.description: The Medical Assisting in Orthopaedics Certificate Course is designed to advance the skills, knowledge, and competencies of health care professionals who either currently work in an orthopaedic office or have a desire to.
10592e28-66e8-4d3e-8643-4470bf488f1d.name: Medical Assisting in Orthopaedics Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Medical Assistant (MA) or another allied health professional
Must pass a 100 multiple-choice question final assessment with a minimum score of 80%
Must complete 5 modules including knowledge checks and quizzes

7c880369-b5bd-46e1-8e5c-335a4c4e4469.description: This REACH Certificate is designed to advance immunization-related skills, knowledge, and competencies of healthcare professionals.
7c880369-b5bd-46e1-8e5c-335a4c4e4469.name: Immunization Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Medical Assistant (MA), Patient Care Technician (PCT), Registered Nurse (RN), Nurse Practitioner (NP), Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN), Physician Assistant or other allied health professional.
Must pass the 100 multiple-choice question final assessment with a minimum score of 80%.
Must complete six modules, including knowledge checks and quizzes.

6313775e-5d41-4ad2-b7d2-2654c05f62e6.description: Molecular Diagnostics Technnologist certification is designated as MDT(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and/or experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous MDT exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of molecular diagnostics technologists.
6313775e-5d41-4ad2-b7d2-2654c05f62e6.name: Molecular Diagnostics Technologist

alignments.name: National Accreditation Agency for Clinical Laboratory Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: MDT Certification Routes
MDT Exam Outline
Must pass the MDT exam with a score of 70% or above.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

1dbb8116-41f6-4a2a-8fe1-d38966f58b9c.description: The ECG REACH Certificate is designed to develop the skills of allied health professionals who wish to perform ECGs or to advance their knowledge of the ECG procedure. This REACH Certificate includes in-depth lessons on the operation of ECG equipment, how to conduct the ECG procedure, the heart abnormalities that an ECG helps to diagnose, and the significance of the waveforms produced by the 12-lead ECG.
1dbb8116-41f6-4a2a-8fe1-d38966f58b9c.name: ECG Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Medical Assistant (MA), Patient Care Technician (PCT), Registered Nurse (RN), Nurse Practitioner (NP), Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN), Physician Assistant or other allied health professional.
Must pass the 100 multiple-choice question final assessment with a minimum score of 80%
Must complete seven modules, including knowledge checks and quizzes.

5a7ee843-3ee6-4a27-a602-a67126638a56.description: The AMT Point-of-Care Testing (POCT) Specialist REACH Certificate Course is designed to advance the skills, knowledge, and competencies of health care professionals who manage point-of-care laboratory testing, or professionals who wish to gain higher-level, specialist knowledge about POCT.
5a7ee843-3ee6-4a27-a602-a67126638a56.name: Point-of-Care Testing (POCT) Specialist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Medical Technologist (MT), Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT), Certified Medical Laboratory Assistant (CMLA)
Must pass the Point-of-Care Specialist Testing Certificate Course Final Assessment

Complete the eight self-paced modules in this course, and then take the final assessment. There is only one attempt allowed for the 100-question final assessment. A retake exam may be purchased for a fee. The certificate/badge is valid for two years from the date of passing the final assessment.

574e4087-3066-4888-bec3-7b1e7e226ba0.description: AMT’s Clinical Laboratory Consultant certification is designated as CLC(AMT) and may be earned by eligible candidates who provide required documentation and a portfolio of expertise to illustrate critical competencies as a clinical laboratory consultant. The certificant is a medical laboratory expert who functions independently in providing laboratory-related guidance to healthcare facilities. The CLC also possesses expertise as a generalist or may provide specialized services.
574e4087-3066-4888-bec3-7b1e7e226ba0.name: Certified Laboratory Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: CLC Certification Routes
Current professional certification or license in clinical laboratory field

Current member of two or more professional/business organizations OR Developed resource material references used in consulting practice (i.e., books, periodicals, audio and videotapes, newsletters, government publications, and all other resources

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

f40684de-a0ed-41c4-8e6c-5a42c427d108.description: The Point-of-Care Testing (POCT) Specialist REACH Certificate is designed to advance the skills, knowledge, and competencies of health care professionals who manage point-of-care laboratory testing or who wish to gain higher-level, specialist knowledge about POCT.
f40684de-a0ed-41c4-8e6c-5a42c427d108.name: Point-of-Care Testing (POCT) Specialist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: This course is ideal for current or aspiring MTs or MLTs, other laboratory professionals, or anyone interested in gaining specialist knowledge about POCT.
Must pass the 100 multiple-choice question final assessment with a minimum score of 80%.
Must complete eight modules, including knowledge checks and quizzes.

1e52e7db-6cde-442d-a43c-a90c22529e70.description: Patient Care Technician certification is designated as PCT(AMT) by American Medical Technologists. It is an objective third-party credential earned by eligible individuals who meet stringent criteria for education and experience. Certificants must pass the rigorous PCT exam, which assesses knowledge, skills and abilities associated with the critical competencies of entry-level patient care technicians.

Individuals are required to maintain their certification and competencies through payment of an annual renewal fee and completion every 3 years of a specified amount of continuing education and/or professional activities.

286eb573-3266-4586-b38b-a0adb3f87c13.description: The Telehealth REACH Certificate advances the skills of allied health professionals who either currently work with telehealth, or who wish to expand their telehealth knowledge and expertise. This REACH certificate contains in-depth lessons on telehealth fundamentals, technologies, laws, documentation and billing, and effective communication strategies.
286eb573-3266-4586-b38b-a0adb3f87c13.name: Telehealth Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Medical Assistant (MA), Patient Care Technician (PCT), Certified Medical Administrative Specialist (CMAS), Allied Health Instructor (AHI), or other allied health professional.
Must pass the 70 multiple-choice question final assessment with a minimum score of 80%.
Must complete six modules, including knowledge checks and quizzes.
